sentences.en: -- Actively participating in and promoting international cooperation in drug control.
sentences.cn: ― ―积极参与和推动国际禁毒合作.

sentences.en: Another third of the elementary schools are actively working to acquire computers.
sentences.cn: 另有三分之一的小学正在积极准备添置计算机.

sentences.en: As a landowner, he was actively interested in agricultural improvements.
sentences.cn: 作为土地所有者, 他对于农业方面的改良怀有浓厚的兴趣.

sentences.en: Auxins are produced mainly by young developing leaves on actively growing shoots.
sentences.cn: 生长素主要是从旺盛生长新梢上正在发育的幼叶产生出来.

sentences.en: Cold air is actively burrowing under warm air.
sentences.cn: 冷空气快速地潜入到暖空气下面.

sentences.en: During this period all the students were actively participating.
sentences.cn: 在这节课中所有的学生都积极参加.

sentences.en: She was actively looking for a job.
They actively cam-paigned for the vote.
sentences.cn: 他们积极参加竞选运动。

sentences.en: They are actively lobbying against the bill.
sentences.cn: 他们正在积极游说议员,阻止通过该项法案.

sentences.en: They are actively lobbying for the bill.
sentences.cn: 他们正在为使议案通过而积极游说议员.

sentences.en: They have never been actively encouraged to take such risks.
sentences.cn: 他们从未被撺掇去冒这样的风险。

sentences.en: We are actively intervening to settle a quarrel.
sentences.cn: 我们正在积极调解争执.

sentences.en: We will actively manage your portfolio to maximise the return on your investment.
sentences.cn: 我们会积极管理您的投资组合,使您获得最大的投资回报.

sentences.en: We will actively manage your portfolio to maximize the return on your investment.
sentences.cn: 我们会积极管理您的投资组合，使您获得最大的投资回报。

sentences.en: You can actively argue with your mind.
sentences.cn: 你可以积极地和你的思想争论。

sentences.en: Your proposal is being actively considered.
sentences.cn: 你的提议正得到认真考虑.

words.tran_cn: 积极的；活跃的；主动的；有效的；现役的
行动；活动；功能；战斗；情节
催化剂；[助剂] 活化剂；[助剂] 激活剂；触媒剂
主观能动性；活动积极性
积极分子；激进主义分子
使激活；使活动起来；有生气（activate的过去分词）
刺激；使活动；使活泼；使产生放射性
